changelog:
## Changes in v1.0.40

### Sport Section - Channel Switching Fixed
- FIXED: Channels now show correct numbers in fullscreen EPG
- FIXED: Channel switching works correctly (next/previous)
- FIXED: Channels load BEFORE fullscreen opens
- Player still starts immediately while channels load in parallel

### Previous fixes
- v1.0.39: No loading screen when opening from Sport
- v1.0.38: Smart Sync with MD5 hash check
- v1.0.37: Sport fullscreen navigation
